Computer.name: MNC Asset Server
Computer.file:
The "Operator_x-server.sys" file serves as a backup for the standard issue Operator x-server theme. This should be utilised in the event that you lose your x-server.sys file, either due to hostile action or from data corruption.
You are reminded that modification of your terminal's x-server theme is in violation of your contract with the Municipal Network Committee and sanctions may be enforced against Operators known to be performing unauthorised cosmetic modifications to their terminals.
